Moran, Assistant Public Defender, of counsel,) for appeHant.Edward V. Hanrahan, State’s Attorney, of Chicago, (Robert A. NoveHe, Assistant State’s Attorney, of counsel,) for the People.

Abstract of Decision

Opinion by Mr. JUSTICE DRUCKER.
